thread.title: JinkoSolar Reaches $5.1 Million Settlement in ADR Lawsuit
thread.title_full: JinkoSolar Reaches $5.1 Million Settlement in ADR Lawsuit - WSJ

author: Tess Stynes
title: JinkoSolar Reaches $5.1 Million Settlement in ADR Lawsuit
text:
JinkoSolar Holding Co. Ltd. said it reached a nearly $5.1 million settlement of a 2011 lawsuit with class-action status representing purchasers of the Chinese solar-products company’s American depositary shares between their U.S. stock market debut in May 2010 and September 2011.
JinkoSolar said it doesn’t anticipate any charges related to the...
